rows.label: tev021601_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev021601_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask Phina about the attack on the White Whale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_JNK0020
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev021601_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask Phina about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021601_SEL1011
rows.name: Ask Phina about the war with the Ganglion.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_SEL1021
rows.name: Ask Phina about recent developments.

rows.label: tev021601_SEL1031
rows.name: Ask Phina about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_SEL1051
rows.name: Ask Phina about the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0001
rows.name:
The attack on the Whale by the xenoform pursuit force
was like living through a nightmare.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0002
rows.name:
We'd slay them and slay them, but the unidentified
xenos would just keep pouring out of deep space.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0003
rows.name:
I'd watch as my friends' Skells were destroyed in
silence, and as the armor on the White Whale's hull
shattered without a sound.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0004
rows.name:
We fought as hard as we could, but they ultimately
broke through our defensive line and infiltrated the
ship.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0005
rows.name:
So many people were murdered by those monsters,
and they never even knew why.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0006
rows.name:
I intend to continue fighting for humanity,
but I hope that I never have to be a part
of a battle like that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0008
rows.name:
Have you ever fought the tyrant they call Eckart the
Indestructible who lurks on the high ground of the
Grieving Plains?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0009
rows.name:
I guess we Harriers can boast that we were able to
face down a creature like that and live to tell the tale.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0010
rows.name:
But in truth, we were no match for the beast.
We had four Skells concentrating fire on it,
and the thing barely flinched.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0011
rows.name:
After it destroyed Grette's Skell, our leader, Adelbert,
ordered a full retreat.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0012
rows.name:
Of all the planets to land on, why'd it have to be
this one? ...Still, I guess I should be grateful that at
least my friend Grette wasn't wounded in the incident.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0021
rows.name:
I will never forgive the monsters that killed Grette
and the others.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0022
rows.name:
I know it's probably shameless to ask you this,
seeing as how I'm planning to leave BLADE...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0023
rows.name:
But please, I beg of youâ€”kill every last one of those
bastards for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0024
rows.name:
Hunt them down and wipe every last member of
the Ganglion off the face of Mira![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0014
rows.name:
I've received treatment from the counselor and the
mimeosome technician that Dirk found for me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0015
rows.name:
Thanks to that, I've finally been able to go outside
again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0016
rows.name:
But I still intend to quit BLADE. I never want to see
anything like what happened ever again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0017
rows.name:
Still, I've been thinking of looking for some sort
of support job I can perform here in the city.
It's the least I can do, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0018
rows.name: I can't just keep relying on Dirk for everything.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0030
rows.name:
I heard that they found the Lifehold Core, and that it's
all thanks to the data your team reclaimed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0031
rows.name: Thank you so much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0032
rows.name:
Now if everything goes well, they might be able to
bring Adelbert and Grette back to life, along with
everyone else who died.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0033
rows.name:
For the sake of all our fallen friends, I wish you the
best of luck on the final recovery mission.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0040
rows.name:
So my fleshly body is asleep in the Lifehold Core,
alongside yours, and Adelbert's, and Grette's,
and everyone else.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0041
rows.name:
And if we've secured that, it means that everyone
will be able to return to the way they were, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0042
rows.name:
Grette will be back bossing everyone around,
and Adelbert will be back rushing about trying to
make Grette happy.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0043
rows.name:
And Dirk and I will be able to watch them and roll
our eyes in amusement. ...Can we really return to
those days again?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev021601_MSG0044
rows.name:
I hope they complete their investigation soon.
Then all of us who have lost so much can finally
see our family and friends return home.[ST:wait ]
